Post: "I shared my struggles with depression, and all I got was criticism and anger. It's like, no matter what I do, I'm always wrong. I'll never be good enough. #depression #failure"
Transferred_Post:
"I have been open about my struggles with depression, but the response I received was criticism and anger. It seems that nothing I do is ever good enough, and I feel like a failure in many aspects of my life. #depression #failure"

Please note that in this transferred post, the attributional style has been changed from global to specific. The original post attributes the cause of depression to "no matter what I do, I'm always wrong. I'll never be good enough", which is a global attribution. In contrast, the transferred post attributes the cause to specific factors such as "the response I received" and "nothing I do is ever good enough", which are specific attributions.
